Chapter 2396 - Chapter 2396: All Living Beings Are Summoned Under The Milky Way (3)

Chapter 2396: All Living Beings Are Summoned Under the Milky Way (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio     Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

She could detect that?

Xu Xiaoshou was stunned and became more vigilant.

Although his portrait clone did not have the ‘Stealth’, he had used the Divine Array to conceal his aura.

If this could even be detected, it meant that Dao Qiongcang did not just randomly make the arrangement for his troops to fool the Holy Divine Palace.

Yu Zhiwen had her reasons for being here!

He recalled that this lady was now the new Chief of the Path Division. After Situ Yongren’s death, she was the first on the heavenly ranking of the Path Division. She was also the head of the younger generation’s Divine Secret energy movement.

The direct combat strength of a Divine Sorceress could be said to be very low. Even Dao Qiongcang suffered when he entered Abyss Island, let alone Yu Zhiwen.

However, in terms of the power of planning, if a Divine Sorceress had made preparations beforehand, she could not be underestimated.

Xu Xiaoshou hesitated for a moment before he said to the Frost Ferret, who was about to come out of the Apricot Realm.

“You don’t have to come out yet.”

“This Divine Secret person is not weak. Even if you were prepared and used your escape techniques, I’m afraid you would still be discovered.”

The Frost Ferret was so frightened that it trembled. It glanced at the hateful woman who stood at the top of the tower who gave off a ‘I’m very weak’ vibe.

Xu Xiaoshou opened up his ‘Independence’.

He didn’t even use the Vanishing Technique. Instead, he leaped and landed on the Vermilion Bird Golden Tower.

In the dark sky, the Galaxy hung in the distance.

The Pearl Tower of the Vermilion Bird Golden Tower was huge enough to accommodate two people standing side by side.

Xu Xiaoshou silently appeared behind Yu Zhiwen. He was so close that he could already smell the familiar fragrance on Little Yu’s body.

That head that was one head shorter was soft and easy to rub.

Xu Xiaoshou suppressed his urge and looked down.

“Da da da…”

Yu Zhiwen fiddled with an astrolabe in her hand. The divine path patterns on it were even more complicated than the vast stars.

Today was different from the past. Xu Xiaoshou no longer needed Yu Zhiwen to teach him and easily saw through the mysteries of the astrolabe.

This was to locate any suspicious people near the Vermilion Bird Golden Tower. Once an existence that exceeded the standard appeared nearby, it would be displayed on the astrolabe.

The trial takers were displayed in green.

However, there was a faint red glow in the northeast direction of the astrolabe.

“It’s not an illusion?”

Yu Zhiwen mumbled to herself as she looked in the direction. She realized that there really was a suspicious presence.

However, that person seemed to have just passed by and did not stay. Or rather, he died very quickly as soon as he appeared.

Only then would the red marking on the astrolabe fade away and return to nothingness.

Xu Xiaoshou could tell that it was the position of his portrait clone.

He smiled.

At the center of the astrolabe next to Yu Zhiwen, there was an eye-catching red light that flashed furiously.

He did not use the Vanishing Technique, so the astrolabe marked his existence.

However, he had activated the Independence, so even though the astrolabe reminded her, Yu Zhiwen subconsciously forgot to pay attention to it.

“Silly… ”

Xu Xiaoshou’s playful spirit was aroused as he aimed his hand at the back of Little Yu’s head.

He could already imagine how funny the ‘ouch’ sound would be.

However, his smile suddenly disappeared and he stopped his movements.

Yu Zhiwen wore a black earring that looked like the one Aunt Xiang gave him.

Xu Xiaoshou was a person who paid great attention to details.

He had seen the same thing on Ao Sheng, Wei Feng, and Beibei.

He was awakened.

This was not the White Cave, but the Four Symbols Secret Realm.

He had many Saint Servants behind him, and Little Yu also had the Heavenly Group behind her.

The joke played in the White Cave, was something that made his life and death a huge risk now.

The wind in the Vermilion Bird Golden Tower was very strong, but it could not blow away the frustration that had arisen in his heart for a moment. It was as if as people grew up, troubles would follow.

Above the Nine Heavens, the starlight was scattered. The faint light elongated the two shadows on the Pearl Tower that no one had noticed.

Silently.

One of them disappeared.

Yu Zhiwen took a deep breath and turned around.

The Pearl Gem Star Eyes lit up in the darkness at this moment without any hesitation and was extremely beautiful.

She could not see anyone behind her.

However, it was just like how Xu Xiaoshou could feel the fragrance.

As the wind blew, Yu Zhiwen also smelled a familiar scent.

Her starry eyes could not see anyone, but her sense of smell told her with absolute certainty…

“He is here!”

“He was just here!”
